description:
Seth Noel is an auctioneer working at the Black Market. He is the man who convinced http://anidb.net/ch80778 [Chise] to sell herself in the auction and give herself to someone who would cares. The final bid was 5 million pounds and was paid by cheque by http://anidb.net/ch80775 [Elias Ainsworth].
Source: Mahou Tsukai no Yome Wiki
name: Seth Noel
